nxtim.instruction
Class InstructionStructure

java.lang.Object
  nxtim.instruction.InstructionStructure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IElementProgramme, Instruction
Direct Known Subclasses:
InstructionConditionelle, InstructionInconditionelle
public abstract class InstructionStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Instruction

Concept abstrait regroupant toutes les instructions composées d'un corps contenant d'autres instruction.
Utilisation du design pattern Composite.

See Also:
Serialized Form
